body: Before you attempt a saving throw against a spell or effect that also targets one or more allies within 30 feet, you can expend one use of mythic power as an immediate action to allow your allies to use your saving throw result or their own, whichever is higher.
name: Stand Tall
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Heroes/Marshal/Marshal Features/1st-Tier Marshal Path Abilities/Stand Tall
